column4: Push:  Is it possible to "blacklist" an application from the global menu? In my case I want to exclude Gimp from it.
you can deselect it in the menu editor & it won't show up in the menus
is it possible to "blacklist" application from the global menu? In my case I wan't exclude Gimp
I don't mean the Unity Menu. I meant the global menu in the panel. I don't want to have main menu of gimp (just gimp) in the panel
